thread.title: Pentagon Says Syrian Strikes Kill al Qaeda Fighters, Including Longtime Leader
thread.title_full: Pentagon Says Syrian Strikes Kill al Qaeda Fighters, Including Longtime Leader - WSJ

author: Ben Kesling
title: Pentagon Says Syrian Strikes Kill al Qaeda Fighters, Including Longtime Leader

organizations.name: pentagon says syrian strikes kill al qaeda fighters

text:
WASHINGTON—American military airstrikes last week killed nearly a dozen al Qaeda militants in Syria, including a top-ranked operative, the Pentagon announced Wednesday.
One strike Feb. 3 killed 10 al Qaeda militants gathered near Idlib, Syria, and a second on Feb. 4 killed Abu Hani al-Masri, a militant leader who the Pentagon said has been active in setting up al Qaeda networks and training since the group’s earliest days in the...
